exclusion.criterion: Previous diagnosis of an illness associated with premature ovarian failure (Turner's syndrome, Fragile X permutation carrier)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous surgical excision of one ovary or both ovaries
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome and previous karyotype study confirmed the diagnosis. She is treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy to avoid menarche and reach the ideal height.
